title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Modern shopping experience with React. Increased conversion rates by 45%.
longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce solution featuring three distinct storefronts: VIBE (fashion), LUXE (luxury goods), and SneakPeak (sneakers). Built with React and modern web technologies, this platform delivers a seamless shopping experience with real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and responsive design.

title: Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time data visualization with interactive charts and insights.
longDescription: A powerful analytics dashboard that provides real-time insights into business metrics. Features interactive charts, customizable widgets, and data export capabilities. Built to handle large datasets efficiently with optimized rendering and caching strategies.

title: Corporate Website
description: Professional landing page that boosted client inquiries by 60%.
longDescription: A modern corporate website designed to showcase services and drive conversions. Features smooth animations, SEO optimization, and a content management system for easy updates. The site achieved a 60% increase in client inquiries within the first month.
